name: Shortcode Mastery
author: Uncleserj

sections.description:
Unlimited potential in art of creation shortcodes!

Using the Twig template engine helps you code everything you need to achieve the functionality you’re doing.

=Main features:=
* Unlimited default parameters
* Twig Template Engine
* Query Builder
* Scripts and Styles
* WPBackery Integration
* Elementor Integration
* AJAX driven

=External Libs:=
* VueJS
* Twig
* Ace
* Fontello
sections.installation: To setup Shortcode Mastery plugin just active Shortcode Mastery in plugins menu page.
sections.faq: If you have trouble with setup, please contact me on serj@serj.pro
sections.changelog:
13.02.19 – v2.0.0

  • Query Builder
  • WPBackery Integration
  • Elementor Integration
  • Scripts and Styles
  • Bug fixes

08.08.17 – v1.1.0

  • Fixed Taxonomy, Date and Meta Query render and layout
  • Sanitization Improvements
  • Ajax Improvements
  • Restrictions by roles
  • Layout Rebuild
  • TinyMCE Customizer
  • Parameters Twig Rendering
  • Cache Cleaning System
  • Widget text and Category description shortcodes
  • Bug Fixes

14.07.17 – v1.0.1

  • Initial release

short_description: Shortcode Mastery Ð°llows you to create shortcodes with rich customization options and unlimited number of default parameters.
